scripts.format: js-beautify -r *.mjs private/*.html private/scripts/*.js private/views/*.html public/*.html public/scripts/*.js test/*/*.js && prettier --write **.css
scripts.lint: eslint --cache *.mjs private/*.html private/scripts/*.js private/views/*.html public/*.html public/scripts/*.js test/*/*.js && stylelint --cache **/*.css && html-validate private public
